name: Rite Shield Security
overview:
Established in the year, 2012, we ‘Rite Shield Security’ are an eminent organization involved in trading and supplying a comprehensive range of Security and Surveillance Products. In this range we are offering products such as Indoor Box CCTV Camera, Indoor Dome CCTV Camera, Indoor IR Dome CCTV Camera, Bullet 20 MTR CCTV Camera, Bullet 80 MTR CCTV Camera, Wireless Burglar Alarm System. Moreover, we are offering Fingerprint Time & Attendance Recorder, Touch Fingerprint Time & Attendance Recorder and many more.

Vendors Base: We are backed by a substantial vendor base. Leveraging on our vendor base, we are able procure and deal in a high performing range of Security and Surveillance Products. Vendors that are associated with us use only premium quality basic material to manufacture the products. Along with this, our vendors develop products while considering laid down quality benchmarks of the industry, which demonstrate the high-standards of their products.

our Team: Procurement agents Engineers Quality auditors Logistic personnel Warehouse personnel Sales and marketing personnel

Quality Assurance: We are committed to provide our clients with a gamut of qualitative Security and Surveillance Products. Product-line which is made available by us is procured from the established vendors of the industry. Furthermore, this presented product-array is manufactured by making use of supreme quality requisite raw material at our vendors’ end.
